long_description: The women's REI Revelcloud jacket offers warmth that won't weigh you down when you're active. Because it's so light and packs so small, it's ideal for backpacking and traveling. All-conditions PrimaLoft(R) Eco fill is ultralight and ultrathin, yet very warm; sleek 60g fill weight insulates efficiently while also allowing easy movement. Pertex(R) Quantum recycled fabric blocks winds up to 50 mph; the fabric also has a durable water repellent (DWR) finish and a silky texture. Jacket stows inside its own inner lumbar pocket for packing ease. Includes zip hand pockets and a zip chest pocket with a cord port. The women's REI Revelcloud jacket has an adjustable hem drawcord and comfortable stretch bindings at cuffs. Front zipper has a chinguard and a stormflap.
short_description: The women's REI Revelcloud jacket offers warmth that won't weigh you down when you're active. Because it's so light and packs so small, it's ideal for backpacking and traveling.
